org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types

Class MacAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<MacAddress>, OFValueType<MacAddress>, PrimitiveSinkable

    public class MacAddress
extends Object
implements OFValueType<MacAddress>
    Wrapper around a 6 byte mac address.
    Author:
    Andreas Wundsam <andreas.wundsam@bigswitch.com>

      • of

        @Nonnull
public static MacAddress of(@Nonnull
                    String macString)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Parse a mac adress from the canonical string representation as 6 hex bytes separated by colons (01:02:03:04:05:06).
        Parameters:
        macString - - a mac address in canonical string representation
        Returns:
        the parsed MacAddress
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if macString is not a valid mac adddress
